New Records: Myles Turner went over 8,000 career points.
Key Match Events: Myles Turner had season highs with 30 points and 11 rebounds.
Tyrese Haliburton had a season-best 25 points and 12 assists.
Luka Doncic had 34 points and 15 assists.
Naji Marshall matched a career high with 20 points off the bench.
Andrew Nembhard put Indiana back ahead with a finger-roll basket with 5:37 to play.
Dallas missed four consecutive possessions including three-point attempts by Klay Thompson and Doncic, a missed jumper by Irving, and a 24-second violation.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pacers played their first game without power forward Isaiah Jackson, who sustained a torn right Achilles tendon.
Dallas' Dereck Lively II was out with a sprained shoulder.
Maxi Kleber missed his fifth consecutive game because of a hamstring injury.
Rick Carlisle is 5-2 against the Mavericks since becoming Indiana’s coach in 2021.
